constituent: ocean, water, water droplets, water pistol, sheep
heisigStory: Water . . . sheep. Be sure to keep the stories and key word of this kanji distinct from those for sea. (Frame 500).
koohiiStory1: This kanji refers to the waters of the Pasheephic ocean.
koohiiStory2: Remember the story of Jason and the Argonauts from Greek myth? Jason travelled across oceans of water in order to recover the fleece of a certain sheep.
myStory: đại dương. dê gặp nước là đại dương
words: shop which handles Western-style apparel and accessories
